text: Kofiron ʙa sitoʙ az tu ej Pajomʙar, omadani uquʙatu azoʙro pes az rahmatu neki metalaʙand. Hamono pes az inho ʙaroi takziʙkunandagon azoʙu uquʙatho guzastaast. Pas ci guna iʙrat namegirand? Hamono Parvardigori tu ʙo vucudi zolim ʙudanason sohiʙi omurzis ast mardumonro. Hamono Parvardigori tu saxt azoʙkunanda ast
